book.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
book.author: Yuval Noah Harari

attributes.attribute: Chronicles the evolution of Homo sapiens from ancient times to the modern era, touching upon various aspects like culture, science, and politics.
Harari provides thought-provoking insights on capitalism, religion, and the possible future paths for humanity.
